about_the_game:
Hundreds of packs, thousands of items. Can you collect them all?
Toybox is a Free To Play game about collecting anything and everything.
Check back daily for free packs, earn in-game currency and unlock mini-games, environments, props, and more!

        

1000+ Items!

With over 1000 items currently in the game, and new packs being released frequently, you'll never get bored!

Custom Homes

Display your items, customize your personal space, and invite friends over to play and hang out!

Mini-Games

Achieving certain goals and unlocking certain items and environments will allow you to access hidden mini-games that you can play by yourself or with friends!

Community-Driven

We planned from the beginning of development to prepare for the game to be shaped and molded around what the community would like to see.
Any suggestions, comments, feedback, etc. should be redirected to our Discord, where we are active daily!

name: Toybox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible with latest drivers
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
